headline: Is McCormick (MKC) Pricing Fair After Recent Share Rebound And DCF Valuation Gap?
summary: If you are wondering whether McCormick is fairly priced or offering value right now, you are not alone. Many investors are reassessing what they are willing to pay for steady consumer brands. The stock last closed at US$67.42, after a 9.0% return over the past 7 days, while the 1 year return sits at an 11.7% decline and the 5 year return at a 16.6% decline. Recent news flow around McCormick has focused on the company as a long standing player in spices and flavorings, as well as the market's...
